flavor_text_entries.red:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Tough fights could
excite this
POKéMON. When excited, it may
blow out bluish-
white flames.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
It is very hot­
headed by nature,
so it constantly seeks opponents.
It calms down only
when it wins.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
It has a barbaric
nature. In battle,
it whips its fiery tail around
and slashes away
with sharp claws.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
If it becomes
agitated during
battle, it spouts intense flames,
incinerating its
surroundings.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
CHARMELEON mercilessly destroys its
foes using its sharp claws.
If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the
flame at the tip of its tail flares with a
bluish white color.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
CHARMELEON mercilessly destroys its
foes using its sharp claws.
If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the
flame at the tip of its tail flares with a
bluish white color.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes.
If it encounters a strong enemy, it
becomes agitated, and the flame on its
tail flares with a bluish white color.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It lashes about with its tail to knock
down its foe. It then tears up the fallen
opponent with sharp claws.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
When it swings its burning tail, it
elevates the air temperature to 
unbearably high levels.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
In the rocky mountains where
CHARMELEON live, their fiery
tails shine at night like stars.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
In the rocky mountains where
CHARMELEON live, their fiery
tails shine at night like stars.

In the rocky mountains where
CHARMELEON live, their fiery
tails shine at night like stars.

so it constantly seeks opponents.
It calms down only when it wins.

it whips its fiery tail around
and slashes away with sharp claws.

If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive.

Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp

In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Tough fights could excite this Pokémon. When
excited, it may breathe out bluish-white flames.
